attributes.action: propose that: America be excluded from any negotiations regarding Israel & Palestine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: America is too involved with Israel to have an unbiased contribution to the solution. America's foreign policy and government is controlled by lobbyists. There are more American Jews in Israel than those born there. Israel spends over 3 billion dollars of 80 billion American aid on arms and military hardware from  America. Israel has America's nuclear weapons closer to Russia than anywhere else. Need I really say more!
